meanings.def: the hard work and effort that somebody puts into an activity or a purpose because they think it is important
examples: dedication to somebody/something I really admire Gina for her dedication to her family.
It takes dedication to be successful in a sport.
Not everyone has the dedication and the talent to achieve this.
You will need dedication and determination to complete the course.
He paid tribute to the high level of dedication and professionalism of the staff.
There was no doubting Luke's dedication to the campaign.

meanings.def: a ceremony that is held to show that a building or an object has a special purpose or is special to the memory of a particular person
examples: the dedication of a new city church

meanings.def: the words that are used at the beginning of a book, piece of music, a performance, etc., or when receiving an award, to offer it to somebody as a sign of thanks or respect
